alert.note: Alert for Camp; Gregg; Morris; Smith; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 9:50PM CST until March 02 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Smith County in northeastern Texas... Eastern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Morris County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Camp County in northeastern Texas... Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 950 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Naples to Liberty City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Longview, Kilgore, White Oak, Gladewater, Gilmer, Daingerfield, Lone Star, Naples, Ore City, Omaha, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Rocky Branch, Diana, Liberty City, Jenkins, West Mountain, Cedar Springs, Cason and Lakeport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Texas.
